extension.summary: Run Shell Scripts via a Menu
extension.description: Provides an interactive menu for selecting and executing shell scripts. The menu layout and script definitions are configured via a simple text file (see README.md for details).

Stellt ein interaktives Menü zur Auswahl und Ausführung von Shell-Skripten bereit. Die Struktur des Menüs und die Skriptdefinitionen werden über eine einfache Textdatei konfiguriert (siehe README.md für Details).
extension.news:
v2.0.0 (2025/4) - support for submenu - support for dynamic menus, created by script - dropped support inividual keyboard keys due to complexity with sub-menus
v1.0.1 (2022/10/18) - support inividual keyboard keys per menu item. v1.0.0 - removed blocking flag as non blocking it produced zombie processes - introduced flags notify, exitcode - improved error handling
v0.9.1 - added skins
v0.9.0 - Initial Version
